title: Brand's Ult Bounce
body:
Hey!
Just trying to figure out, does brand's ult bounce prioritizes champions on all bounces even if only the initial target is ablaze? Or does each target have to be ablaze? Thanks! {{champion:63}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=SuicidalPickle,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=YKy5b6Fi,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-05T10:53:29.813+0000)
>
> Hey!
> Just trying to figure out, does brand's ult bounce prioritizes champions on all bounces even if only the initial target is ablaze? Or does each target have to be ablaze? Thanks! {{champion:63}}

Each target after the first will be random unless effected by his passive. Then champions will be picked. Targeting a Blaze effected champion with Pyroclasm is a good way to get it to hit 2 champions but after the second hit anything could happen if they are not already effected by his passive.
Brands ultimate will bounce off any enemy no matter what but it prioritizes the blazed enemies.
